description:
Isana is coming over to the Irido house this weekend to hang out with Mizuto. Suspecting that she may not know how to properly dress for the occasion, Yume and Akatsuki invite Isana out to go clothes shopping the day before. Unfortunately, however, every outfit she tries on ends up looking inappropriate due to the size of her breasts. Akatsuki suggests that she try on something with a softer silhouette similar to Yume`s usual style, seeing this as an opportunity to pick out new clothes for Yume to try on too. Yume then reminisces about a date she had in middle school.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: "الـثّـنـائـيّ الـسّـابـق حـذِر "سـبـق ورفـضـتـنـي، لـذلـك مـا مـن مـانـع
Moto Couple wa Keikai Suru "Watashi wa Mou Furareterundesu kara, Daijoubu Desu yo"
The Former Couple`s on Edge "I`ve Already Been Rejected, So It`s Fine."
元カップルは警戒する「わたしはもうフラれてるんですから, 大丈夫ですよ」
